mapper.select: select address from business_device where status = 1 ORDER BY IF(ISNULL(update_time), 0, 1), IF(ISNULL(ip), 0, 1), update_time DESC

select.if:
SELECT concat(IF(`online` is not null, `online`, '未知'), ' 【', count(*), '】') as 'label', IF(`online` is not null,`online` , '-1') as 'value' from business_device
GROUP BY `online`

SELECT concat(IF(depllist = '1', '存在', ''), IF(depllist = '0', '不存在', ''), IF(depllist is null, '未知', ''), ' 【', count(*), '】') AS 'label', IF(`depllist` is not null,`depllist` , '-1') AS 'value' from business_device
GROUP BY `depllist`

mapper.select: select `owner` from business_device where address=#{address} and status = 1 limit 1
mapper.update:

and depllist is null
